actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a portion of the Tongue River, Wyo. for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968, a portion of the Tongue River, Wyoming, for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a portion of the Tongue River, Wyo. for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
